TextView.android:text: This Screen will show a song's details. The song name is passed as an intent from the source app, and is then processed by an AsyncTask The Screen shall include an ImageView of the album art, the Song Name, Artists\' name, the main distribution company, the song language, release year and the length of the song There will be a play button which adds this song to the Now Playing list and plays it. This is done by passing an intent to the now playing background service. Apart from that, we need a back button in the action bar.
